subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares scored his first N.H.L. goal, to the delight of a sellout crowd of 16,250 at Nassau Coliseum, but Pittsburgh rallied for a shootout victory.
snippet: John Tavares scored his first N.H.L. goal, to the delight of a sellout crowd of 16,250 at Nassau Coliseum, but Pittsburgh rallied for a shootout victory.
